SELECT o.`order_number` orderNumber,o.`ordstate`,u.`username`, c.`image`,c.`com_type` comType,o.totlemoney,u.`uname`,c.`name`,s.`number`,u.`phone`, o.delivery_time deliveryTime,o.pick_up_time pickUpTime FROM shopcar s INNER JOIN USER u ON s.`uid`=u.`id` INNER JOIN com_order o ON s.`id`=o.`sid` INNER JOIN commodity c ON s.`cid`=c.`id`
and o.`ordstate`=1
and uname like concat('%',#{search_uname},'%')

SELECT o.`order_number` orderNumber,o.`ordstate`,u.`username`, c.`image`,c.`com_type` comType,o.totlemoney,u.`uname`,c.`name`,s.`number`,u.`phone`, o.delivery_time deliveryTime,o.pick_up_time pickUpTime FROM shopcar s INNER JOIN USER u ON s.`uid`=u.`id` INNER JOIN com_order o ON s.`id`=o.`sid` INNER JOIN commodity c ON s.`cid`=c.`id`
and o.`ordstate`=2
and uname like concat('%',#{search_uname},'%')
